CONCIERGE

concierge
interior decorating
Seabridge is pleased to offer a suite of luxury concierge services to our homeowners and guests. Our goal is to make your arrival, stay and eventual departure as pleasant and seamless as possible by arranging for your discriminating requests prior to your arrival. The suite of services includes:
  • Arranging transportation to and from the airport
  • Ensuring your home is properly provisioned, prepared and comfortably cool on your arrival. Whether your needs are fresh flowers, a special blend of breakfast tea, milk or mangoes, our staff will provision according to your personal needs.
  • Linen turndown on arrival
  • Dry cleaning pick up and drop off
  • Maid service
We look forward to fulfilling your distinctive ownership needs. Convenient billing is provided when applicable.
CONCIERGE
